miic.core.corr_mat_processing.corr_mat_trim¶

corr_mat_trim(corr_mat, starttime, endtime)[source]¶

Trim the correlation matrix to a given period.

Trim the correlation matrix corr_mat to the period from starttime to endtime given in seconds from the zero position, so both can be positive and negative. If starttime and endtime are datetime.datetime objects they are taken as absolute start and endtime.

Parameters:
  • corr_mat (dictionary of the type correlation matrix) – correlation matrix to be trimmed
  • starttime (float or datetime.datetime object) – start time in seconds with respect to the zero position
  • order – end time in seconds with respect to the zero position
Rtype tdat:

dictionary of the type correlation matrix
Returns:

tdat: trimmed correlation matrix
